name: YongWei Wu 0001
content: Yongwei Wu | MADSys Search Yongwei Wu Professor, Vice Department Head, IEEE Fellow MADSys Bio My research interests mainly focus on Runtime Environment, Data Storage/Management, Virtualization, Resource Management, Distributed Scheduling, Performance Analysis, Reliability/Fault Tolerant in the Parallel and Distributed Systems. I also do some research on Machine Learning and Data Mining. Education Ph.D. in Applied Mathematics, 2002 Chinese Academy of Sciences Master of Computational Mathematics, 1999 Lanzhou University, Lanzhou, China Bachelor of Computational Mathematics, 1996 Lanzhou University, Lanzhou, China Career Postdoctoral Researcher and Lecturer at Computer Science Department of Computer Science and Technology, Tsinghua University, 2002-2005 Associate Professor at Computer Science Department of Computer Science and Technology, Tsinghua University, 2005-2010 Professor at Computer Science Department of Computer Science and Technology, Tsinghua University, 2010-Present Selected Professional Services Serve as the PC Chair/members for more than 20 international conferences including 19th ACM/IEEE CCGrid 2018, 29th ACM/IEEE SC 2016, 22nd ACM/IEEE HPDC 2013. Steering Committee Member of IEEE Transactions on Sustainable Computing (2015 - 2019) Associate Editor of IEEE Transaction on Cloud Computing (2014 - 2019) Editorial Board member of IEEE Cloud Computing (2015 - 2018) Editorial Board member of Journal of Grid Computing (2013 - now) Editorial Board member of Journal of Cluster Computing (2013 - now) Selected Awards IEEE Fellow, 2023 AAIA Fellow, 2023 Special Scientific and Technological Progress Award, China Computer Federation, 2021 World Leading Internet Scientific and Technological Achievement, World Internet Conference, 2021 HUAWEI Global Olympus Award for Data Storage, Huawei, 2021 1st Class of Scientific and Technological Progress Award, Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of China, 2020 Be Recognised as one of the Leading Talents in Science and Technology (S&T) Innovation of the Ten Thousands Plan, the Organization Department of the Central Committee of the CPC, 2019 Special S&T Progress Award, Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of China, 2017 ACM SIGSOFT 2014 Distinguished Paper Award (FSE 2014) 2nd Class of National Technical Invention Award, China, 2015 1st Class of Technical Invention Award, Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of China, 2014 1st Class of Ministry of Education of China S&T Progress Awards, China, 2007 2nd Class of National S&T Progress Awards, China, 2008 Okawa Foundation Research Grant, Japan, 2010 CVIC SE Talent Award, China, 2011 Shenzhen Outstanding Youth Fund, 2011 Best Paper Award, IMIS'11, Korea, 2011 Best Paper Award, ScalCom'09,
